768283974295183A2A78FCBFBAFE1742: Create a zipline that moves players from point to point
C7C925214E0954D490E48DB594FCAE7C: Create a zipline that moves players from point to point
B59D1E0E4D1405DA0E585BB0034A02CD: Transient Create-Only device that acts as a phone tool interface to Zipline spline points

UserOptionDefinition.Device_ZiplineControlPoint_C.TangentInte: Determines how much the forward direction of this Control Point influences the curve of the path at this location.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Zipline_C.UseCustomColor.Descript: Determines if we use a custom color rather than the default
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Zipline_C.Color.Description: Determines the custom color to use.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Zipline_C.Selected Class.Descript: Determines which class is able to use this Zipline.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Zipline_C.Selected Team.Descripti: Determines which team is able to use this Zipline.
If set, the device will allow all but the selected class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Zipline_C.Invert Team Selection.D: If set, the device will allow all but the selected team.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Zipline_C.OnAttach.Description: Sends a signal when an agent attaches to the zipline.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Zipline_C.OnDetach.Description: Sends an event when an agent detaches from the zipline
